mapper.select: SELECT idx, title, user_user_idx, DATE_FORMAT (created_datetime, '%Y.%m.%d') AS created_datetime, recipe_cover_img, recipe_file_path FROM recipe WHERE idx;
SELECT cmtidx, cmt_content, DATE_FORMAT (cmt_datetime, '%Y.%m.%d') AS cmt_datetime FROM comment WHERE cmtidx

SELECT a.idx as idx, a.created_datetime as created_datetime, a.title as title, a.recommend as recommend FROM recipe as a JOIN user as b ON a.user_user_id = b.user_id WHERE b.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY idx DESC

SELECT a.idx as idx, a.created_datetime as created_datetime, a.title as title, a.recommend as recommend FROM recipe as a JOIN user as b ON a.user_user_id = b.user_id WHERE b.user_id = #{userId} AND title like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY idx DESC

SELECT a.idx as idx, a.title as title, a.created_datetime as created_datetime, a.ingredient as ingredient, a.cooking as cooking, a.cook_time as cook_time, a.cook_comment as cook_comment, a.cook_point as cook_point, a.recipe_deleted_yn as recipe_deleted_yn, a.recipe_cover_img as recipe_cover_img, a.recipe_file_path as recipe_file_path, a.user_user_id as user_user_idx, a.recommend as recommend, a.classification_class_code as classification_class_code, b.class_name as classification_class_name FROM recipe as a JOIN classification as b ON a.classification_class_code = b.class_code AND a.idx = #{idx}
mapper.insert:

mapper.select: INSERT INTO user (user_id, user_pw, user_phone, user_gender, user_year, user_comment, file_name, stored_file_path) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userPhone}, #{userGender}, #{userYear}, #{userComment}, #{fileName}, #{storedFilePath})
SELECT count(*) FROM user WHERE user_id = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM user WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND user_pw = #{userPw}

mapper.update: UPDATE recipe SET title = #{title}, ingredient = #{ingredient}, cook_time = #{cookTime}, cook_comment = #{cookComment}, cook_point = #{cookPoint}, classification_class_code = #{classificationClassCode} WHERE idx = #{idx}
UPDATE recipe SET recipe_deleted_yn = 'Y' WHERE idx = #{idx}
